rdf:Description.dc:description: Catalogue of an exhibition of landscape paintings from the collection of the Alberta Art Foundation; exhibition held at the Edmonton Art Gallery, Mar. 1-Apr. 20, 1986, and at other Canadian galleries, Sept. 3, 1986-Nov. 30, 1987.
